original_text:
The sun and moon stood still in their place
    at the light of your arrows as they sped,
    at the flash of your glittering spear.
korean_text: 날아가는 주의 화살의 빛과 번쩍이는 주의 창의 광채로 말미암아 해와 달이 그 처소에 멈추었나이다

sentences.original_text: The sun and moon stood still in their place
sentences.korean_translation: 해와 달이 그 자리에 멈춰 섰다

sentences.original_text: at the light of your arrows as they sped
at the flash of your glittering spear.
